clinical_study.brief_title: Socket Preservation Using Socket Shield Technique Comparison of Socket Preservation Using Socket Shield Technique With Autogenous Dentin Graft Versus Alloplast Graft Material
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Socket Preservation Using Socket Shield Technique With Autogenous Dentin Graft Versus Alloplast Graft Material (Clinical and Histological Study)

brief_summary.textblock:
Alveolar bone resorption and labial bone plate reduction follow teeth extraction due to the deficiency of blood supply, derived from the loss of periodontal ligaments, and hence the socket shield technique with autogenous dentine was introduced to preserve the periodontal ligaments.
this study aim to evaluate of socket preservation using alloplast with socket shield versus Autogenous dentin graft with socket shield through radiographic analysis of alveolar bone dimension change and mean bone density in addition to histological and histomorphometric analysis for the quality of the formed bone.

primary_outcome.description: This will be assessed in the 1st week postoperatively and measured as follows: None (no inflammation) Mild (intraoral swelling confined to the surgical field) Moderate (extraoral swelling in the surgical zone) Severe (extraoral swelling spreading beyond the surgical zone).
it will be assessed using VAS It rates pain on a scale from 1-10, with 0 representing "no pain" and 10 "very much pain
it will be assessed using CBCT
it will be assessed using CBCT

arm_group.description: Modified socket shield technique with autogenous dentin graft
Modified socket shield technique with alloplast

intervention.intervention_name: Modified socket shield technique with autogenous dentin graft material
intervention.description: The crown of the hopeless tooth will be decoronated, the root will then be sectioned, the lingual root fragment will be carefully retrieved, the remaining buccal root fragment will be thinned and concaved, The coronal part of this shield will be beveled to make a lingual slope then Tooth particles will be demineralized using 2% HNO3 (El-Gomhouria CO. Egypt) for 20 minutes to expose the dentin organic matrix.

intervention.intervention_name: Modified socket shield technique with alloplast graft material
intervention.description: The crown of the hopeless tooth will be decoronated, the root will then be sectioned, the lingual root fragment will be carefully retrieved, the remaining buccal root fragment will be thinned and concaved, The coronal part of this shield will be beveled to make a lingual slope then alloplast graft will be used

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- One or more of non-restorable (fractured or decayed) tooth/teeth in the maxillary aesthetic regions (incisors, premolars) in both side
- Intact labial periodontal tissues.
- Ability to read and sign an informed consent form.
Exclusion Criteria:
- A medical history that contraindicates oral surgical treatment (uncontrolled/untreated diabetes mellitus, immunocompromised status, radio/chemotherapy of the oral and maxillofacial region, treatment with oral and/or intravenous amino-bisphosponates).
- Untreated periodontal disease.
- Vertical root fractures on the labial aspect.
- Tooth /teeth with horizontal fractures below bone level.
- Tooth /teeth with external or internal resorptions.

facility.name: Outpatient Clinic of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery Department, Faculty of Dentistry, Alexandria University

responsible_party.investigator_title: Assistant lecturer of DPH and Clinical statistician
